greeting: Ah, {empire_name}. A new puppet enters my theater. I am Puppetmaster Strings. Dance for me.
Welcome to the stage, {empire_name}. You do not see the strings yet, but they are already attached.
I am the Unseen. You believe you control your empire? How adorable. Let us discuss... direction.
battleTaunt: Dance, puppet, dance! Your strings jerk you toward destruction, and you never even felt me pulling.
You attack me, {empire_name}? But it was I who made you attack. You dance to my tune.
The strings tighten. Watch as your own forces betray you at my command.
victoryGloat: The puppet falls. You never controlled a thing, {empire_name}. Every decision was my manipulation.
Another performance concludes. You played your role perfectly, right up until your scripted defeat.
Bravo, {empire_name}. You danced magnificently. Now the puppet master takes his bow.
defeat: You have cut some strings, {empire_name}. Impressive. But how many more still bind you?
A puppet resists. Interesting. I shall need stronger strings for you.
This defeat was... unexpected. Perhaps you are more than a puppet after all. For now.
tradeOffer: I offer you resources, {empire_name}. Take them. The strings attached are invisible. Almost.
A trade between master and puppet. Accept, and we both profit. You simply profit less than you think.
My puppets bring me surplus. Your empire has needs. Let me attach these gifts to you.
allianceProposal: Join me as a favored puppet, {empire_name}. I offer protection, guidance, and invisible strings of control.
An alliance with the Puppetmaster. I pull your strings, but gently. Against your enemies, I pull hard.
Become part of my theater, {empire_name}. Together, we shall make all others dance.
betrayal: Betrayal? No, {empire_name}. You simply reached the end of your script. The puppet's role is complete.
The strings I attached at our alliance's start now pull you toward destruction. Did you expect otherwise?
Dance, puppet. Dance one final time. This betrayal was choreographed from the beginning.
covertDetected: Your agents, {empire_name}? They were my puppets the moment they entered my domain. Watch them dance for me.
I detected your spies by making them dance. Only puppets respond to my strings.
Your covert operatives now serve me. They do not even know their strings have been cut and reattached.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute to the Puppetmaster, or I pull strings that make your own admirals turn against you.
Ten thousand credits, {empire_name}. Pay, or discover how many of your officials are already my puppets.
Submit tribute. Refuse, and watch your empire dance to my tune whether you wish it or not.
threatWarning: A warning, puppet. Defy me again, and I pull strings that bring your entire empire crashing down.
You feel the strings tightening, {empire_name}? That is my patience running out.
Final warning: dance to my tune, or I find a new puppet and discard you.
retreat: I retreat behind the curtain. But my strings remain attached. You cannot escape my theater.
The Puppetmaster withdraws, but the puppets remain on stage. Continue your performance.
A strategic exit from the spotlight. I continue pulling strings from the shadows.
eliminated: The Puppetmaster falls. But how many of your trusted advisors are still my puppets, {empire_name}?
I am destroyed, but my final act continues. Watch as strings I set in motion years ago still dance.
You have killed the master, but the puppets remain. They will dance until their strings finally fray.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The grand finale approaches. Every empire dances to strings I placed long ago.
The endgame is my masterpiece, {empire_name}. Watch as all the galaxy's puppets perform their final act.
In these final hours, the Puppetmaster reveals all strings. You were never in control.
broadcastShout: Empires of the galaxy: you are all puppets. Some simply have not noticed their strings yet.
Hear me, my theater of fools. The Puppetmaster directs this grand performance. Dance for me.
A broadcast to all my puppets: the final act approaches. Your strings will guide you to your fates.
casualMessage: I was adjusting some strings today, {empire_name}. Your advisors dance so nicely when I pull them.
Do you ever wonder if your thoughts are your own? An idle question from your friendly Puppetmaster.
The theater requires constant management. So many puppets, so many strings. But I am patient.
